mapper.select: -- 测试 sum and group by SELECT id,b_id,SUM(age) AS age FROM table_a WHERE b_id = #{bId} AND COMMENT!='' GROUP BY id;

-- 测试 复杂SQL作为子表 SELECT a.id,b.a_name FROM table_a AS a ,table_b AS b, ( SELECT * FROM table_c WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM table_c WHERE COMMENT=#{comment}) AND d_id>1 AND age IN (10,20,30,40) GROUP BY d_id ) c WHERE 1=1 AND a.b_id = b.id ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
-- 测试 select * from left join SELECT a_name,b_id,c_id,a.create_time,b.update_time FROM (SELECT * FROM table_a) AS a LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM table_b) AS b ON a.b_id = b.id GROUP BY a.b_id DESC;
